TopicTitle: Ideas for fun in sandbox mode?

Articles.Content: I used to play KSP a lot. Too much, actually. It's been a long time since I last played it after getting a little bored of it and I need some ideas for things to try out and do in KSP that you guys think are fun.

build space stations or ground bases everywhere?

Try different mods?

https://www.youtube.com/user/Danny2462/featured

"25 things to do with your X" series, particularly.

That said... I've just got a brilliant idea: NEAR + DRE + Kerbal in chair. Cook'em with style!

Edited July 29, 2014 by biohazard15
The Jool-5 challenge is a great test of one's KSP skills, it tests mission planning, design, navigation, rendezvous and docking, and landing.
Building Kerbal Cannons is always fun... Asteroid bowling can be a great challenge too.
Get over to the Challenges forum, and show off your skills

Moholes

Mini manned ships

Get a kerbal up the steepest mountain

Do a fully cockpit view munar mission

Build some boats.

Explore Kerbin itself.

Get RSS and explore Sol.

build a house with a full interior out of structural panels and stuff, inside should be ramps leading to upper floors, some mock tables, etc..... add openings for "windows" and lighting. and land it on a foreign planet or moon of your choice.
Recreate the early years of the space program. I found that quite time consuming and enjoyable.. and educational.
Do an Eve return? Install addons and try new things?

Build two stations ,not far apart,(maybe on the mun) and connect them visa some sort of rail transport system. Which kept me occupied for the last few days and still does.

Launch a rocket from the easteregg-KSC. That was much fun as well.

I must say, I also suffer a bit from that `been-there-done-that`syndrome. But from time to time a new idea springs into mind. And the stupid ones are the best
Make a copy of the game's folder and delete the GameData/Squad and GameData/NASAMission directories, thus removing all the stock parts. Do stuff with only parts from mods you've never used before.

That's a great idea, I must try it sometime.
Download Kethane and set up a mining and refinery everywhere

If you haven't dabbled in em yet, give Spaceplanes a serious shot. I did about a year ago, and now that's 90% of what I build, lol. I LOVE Spaceplanes, or even just planes in general. I have all sorts... rocket powered, jet powered, Ion powered, gliders, cannon launched..... don't cheat yourself of 50% of the game, and who knows, you might fall in love again.
You could always create a kerbal loaded missile!
